text: Ciaŋ 13.34 Wkp 19.18, Jo 15.12, 15.17, 1 Pi 1.22, 1 Jo 2.7-8, 3.23, 4.21, 2 Jo 1.5 vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ sebɨlɨ agadɨ nalusaŋ iguadin uami. Namɨlaŋ nukeŋ nukeŋ hɨbɨŋ hɨbɨŋ mavɨn hekɨlɨ hɨnihalaŋ uami. Viaŋ nalusaŋ mavɨn hekɨlɨ hɨnilan hameŋ ala namɨlaŋ nukeŋ nukeŋ hɨbɨŋ hɨbɨŋ mavɨn hekɨlɨ hɨnihalaŋ uami.
